[For various reasons we won't be able to meet the next two weeks. The next proposal review meeting will be May 4.]

**2022-04-13 / @rsc, @ianlancetaylor, @bradfitz, @andybons**

**Accepted**

- **crypto/x509: add CertPool.Clone** [#35044](https://golang.org/issue/35044)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **io: make NopCloser forward WriterTo calls to underlying reader** [#51566](https://golang.org/issue/51566)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **ErrorOr type wrapping (T, error)** [#51931](https://golang.org/issue/51931)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **context: add Root as an alias for Background** [#51573](https://golang.org/issue/51573)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **crypto: include support for DTLS in stdlib or x/crypto** [#46915](https://golang.org/issue/46915)
  - proposal retracted by author; **declined**
- **intmath: new package** [#51563](https://golang.org/issue/51563)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **reflect: add DeepCopy** [#51520](https://golang.org/issue/51520)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**

**Likely Accept**

- **go/types: add Object.Origin** [#51682](https://golang.org/issue/51682)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **io: add an \`Err\` field to \`LimitedReader\`** [#51115](https://golang.org/issue/51115)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **net: make LookupCNAME consistent between Unix and Windows, document** [#50101](https://golang.org/issue/50101)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **spec: adjust scope of type parameters declared by method receivers** [#52038](https://golang.org/issue/52038)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **syscall: add PidFD, CgroupFD, and UseCgroupFD options for Linux clone to SysProcAttr** [#51246](https://golang.org/issue/51246)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **x/crypto/acme/autocert: add Manager.StapleOCSP** [#51064](https://golang.org/issue/51064)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **x/crypto/ssh: add ServerConfig.NoClientAuthCallback** [#51994](https://golang.org/issue/51994)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **x/net/http2: add DialTLSContext to Transport** [#52114](https://golang.org/issue/52114)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

**Likely Decline**

- **cmd/go: list available major versions in 'go list -u -m all'** [#51491](https://golang.org/issue/51491)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **encoding/xml: option to treat unknown fields as an error** [#30301](https://golang.org/issue/30301)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **net/http/httputil: can ReverseProxy copy src header to dst header with Set() instead of Add() ?** [#50730](https://golang.org/issue/50730)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **reflect: treat reflect.Type as a pointer where possible for generics & maps** [#52267](https://golang.org/issue/52267)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **x/exp/slices: Find function to select first element matching a condition** [#52006](https://golang.org/issue/52006)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥

- **cmd/cover: extend coverage testing to include applications** [#51430](https://golang.org/issue/51430)
